\h(«Valuan Soldier»)Lord Galcian.
As you ordered, I brought the girl to 
see you.\e

\h(«Galcian»)Excellent.
You may leave.\e
\h(«Valuan Soldier»)As you wish…\e

\h(«Galcian»)At last we meet… Fina.
You cannot imagine how much trouble the Armada
has gone through to find you.\e

\h(«Fina»)…!
How did you know my name?\e

\h(«Galcian»)I am Galcian, the Sworn Protector of 
Valua and Supreme Commander of the 
Imperial Armada.\e

\h(«Galcian»)I am under direct orders from Her 
Royal Highness, Empress Teodora, to 
find you and bring you back to Valua.\e

\h(«Galcian»)As a citizen of the Silver Civilization,
you have information that is useful to us.
Will you help us?\e
\h(«Fina»)……\e

\h(«Galcian»)I see.
I did not expect you to help us 
without the proper motivation.\e

\h(«Galcian»)However… I believe we have the same goals. So,
wouldn't it be best for us to help each other?\e
\h(«Fina»)……\e
\h(«Galcian»)…We will reach Valua in half a day.\e
\h(«Galcian»)Enjoy the comforts of the brig until then.\e
